caption.title: 2006–2100 DJF tropical dynamical changes.
caption.p: Ensemble mean 500 hPa trend of ( a– c) RWS and ( d– f) divergence (DIV) for (left) the CESM LENS, and the CMIP version 5 (CMIP5) model subset that yields a detrended DJF Niño 3.4 SST versus California precipitation correlation of (centre) at least 0.30 (CMIP5 HIGH-r) and (right) <0.20 (CMIP5 LOW-r). Trend units are 10 −11 s −2 century −1 for RWS 500 and 10 −6 s −1 century −1 for DIV 500. Symbols represent trend significance at the 90% (diamond), 95% (X) or 99% (+) confidence level, accounting for autocorrelation.
